Searching.description: DOWNLOAD STEMS HERE: https://www.dropbox.com/s/11hqq8tv5gd1k37/Same%20Deep%20Water%20-%20STEMS%20%2B%20Midi.zip?dl=0 DRY VOCALS HERE: http://www39.zippyshare.com/v/8Fu5Yf27/file.html If you need help mixing/mastering your track please contact Cam - cameron@ckbaudio.com Hey guys! So we have had tons of positive feedback and wonderful support from you all! Also, we have had many requests for the stems of the song so other Artists can remix our track! So what we have decided to do is to make this a REMIX COMPETITION!!! Top 3 remixes will have their tracks Featured on Nextgen Records soundcloud page! (Over 100k followers) How to Enter: 1) Download Stems here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/11hqq8tv5gd1k37/Same%20Deep%20Water%20-%20STEMS%20%2B%20Midi.zip?dl=0 2) Use magic and create a wonderful remix 3) Upload your remix online to Soundcloud and then send us your link to --- Jdeptuck@hotmail.com --- 4) Competition ENDS November 1st and we will announce the WINNERS on November 7th 2015 ** We want to hear ALL Genres so be creative and unique (Hint Hint) ** Also, when you upload your track online and if you release it for a free download and you plan on using a Gateway style download (Follow to download) We would really much appreciate it if you guys could add our links in the your Fangates to help gain us some new fans too! Our soundcloud links are at the bottom :) Please note, we will be viewing your tracks statistics. Reading the comments of the tracks to see what the fans say and also your “Favourites to views” ratio. Just because you get thousands of views doesn’t mean yours is better than anyone else. Quality is very important! Downloadable stems here in case you missed the other 2 links: https://www.dropbox.com/s/11hqq8tv5gd1k37/Same%20Deep%20Water%20-%20STEMS%20%2B%20Midi.zip?dl=0 Original track download here: http://www.download.nextgenrecords.net/?song=414 Deepdink Soundcloud - www.soundcloud.com/djdeepdink Pablo Oliver Soundcloud - https://soundcloud.com/pablo-oliver-tarre Jordi Rivera Soundcloud - https://soundcloud.com/jordirivera Nathan Brumley Soundcloud - https://soundcloud.com/nathanbrumleysongwriter We would like to wish ALL of you luck and would like to say that we are REALLY EXCITED to hear all of your productions!! Good luck !!! Download for free on The Artist Union
Searching.title: Same Deep Water
Searching.artist: Deepdink x Pablo Oliver x Jordi Rivera Ft. Nathan Brumley
